posts.title: TryCatch theCatch
posts.body: Catch 33 is another type of Reasonable Doubt Disonnance

posts.title: Let's Kill'Em ALL
posts.body:
So this post is about the methodical process of studying killers, their motives, their background, their life, their behavior, their though-process and abilities involving decision making to gather as much info as it's needed to develop a system that have this set of minimal of characteristics:
 > Can it tell from input about a person's characteristics ?
 > Can it tell from input their traits and personalities ?
 > Based on external input provided, can it tell if said person is capable or not to commit that same or related crimes again ?

It's an example and simple system that SHOULD be improved!!!
